Class SplitWords

  • Object
    • SplitWords

  • public class SplitWords
extends Object
    This class is used to split text into individual words.
    Author:
    Vasiliki Bili, Konstantinos Marinakos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SplitWords(String text)
      This constructs a SplitWords that splits text into words.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinkedList<String> getSplittedWordsList()
      This splits text into individual words having removed all non-Greek characters and punctuation except full stop.
      String getText()
      This returns the text to be split.
      void setText(String text)
      This sets the text to be split.
      LinkedList<String> toLowerCaseAfterFullstop(LinkedList<String> list)
      This removes full stops and converts words' first letter to lowercase if they are preceded with a full stop.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        This constructs a SplitWords that splits text into words.
        Parameters:
        text - to be split

    • Method Detail

      • setText

        public void setText(String text)
        This sets the text to be split.
        Parameters:
        text - to be split

      • getText

        public String getText()
        This returns the text to be split.
        Returns:
        the text to be split

      • getSplittedWordsList

        public LinkedList<String> getSplittedWordsList()
        This splits text into individual words having removed all non-Greek characters and punctuation except full stop.
        Returns:
        individual words

      • toLowerCaseAfterFullstop

        public LinkedList<String> toLowerCaseAfterFullstop(LinkedList<String> list)
        This removes full stops and converts words' first letter to lowercase if they are preceded with a full stop.
        Parameters:
        list - of words to be converted as stated above
        Returns:
        converted list of words
